elements.description:
All ids in the engine are represented as hashes, so a string needs to be hashed
before it can be compared with an id.
elements.examples:
To compare a message_id in an on-message callback function:

function on_message(self, message_id, message, sender)
    if message_id == hash("my_message") then
        -- Act on the message here
    end
end
elements.name: hash

elements.description: The returned string is always padded with leading zeros

parameters.doc: hash value to get hex string for
parameters.name: h

elements.brief: get hex representation of a hash value as a string
elements.name: hash_to_hex
